body_html: It would be great to get this feature finished an merged. Having Windows CPU/GPU support could allow building the Go and Java APIs for Windows and even with GPU support. Please continue this work and hopefully the tensorflowlers can prioritize this.

body: It would be great to get this feature finished an merged. Having Windows CPU/GPU support could allow building the Go and Java APIs for Windows and even with GPU support. Please continue this work and hopefully the tensorflowlers can prioritize this.
